headline: Constellation Holds Margin Lead as Vistra Expands With Gas Plants and Buybacks
summary: Constellation Energy (NASDAQ: CEG) and Vistra Energy (NYSE: VST) reported Q3 earnings this month, exposing two fundamentally different approaches to power generation. Constellation doubled down on premium nuclear assets and clean energy positioning. Vistra leaned into growth through fossil fuel acquisitions and aggressive capital returns. Clean Premium vs. Diversified Growth Machine Constellation missed Q3 revenue ... Constellation Holds Margin Lead as Vistra Expands With Gas Plants and Buybacks

headline: Has the Market Run Too Far on Constellation Energy After a 311% Three Year Surge?
summary: If you are wondering whether Constellation Energy at around $359 a share is still worth considering after such a strong run, or whether the easy money has already been made, you are not alone. That is exactly what we will unpack here. The stock has pulled back slightly over the past week, down about 1.2%, and is roughly flat over the last 30 days. It is still up 48.3% year to date and 42.7% over the past year, with a 311.0% gain over three years shaping expectations. Those moves have come as...

headline: AI Plays Lead Five Stocks To Watch Near Buy Points
summary: Artificial intelligence, data center and energy plays highlight this week's list of stocks to watch.  Taiwan Semiconductor and Vertiv Holdings have rebounded near buy points following concerns over an AI bubble.  Nuclear play Constellation Energy and Drugmaker Genmab are forming bases, while JPMorgan Chase is closing back in on a buy point.
